Louisville_Jefferson_County.Bullock-Clifton House:
The Bullock-Clifton House is a historic home in the Deer Park neighborhood of Louisville, Kentucky, United States. It is the oldest known surviving wood-frame structure in Jefferson County.


== History ==
The house was built as a manor house for the surrounding farm, which was a 30-acre (120,000 m2) truck farm by the early 20th century.
